Title: The Blood of Juana the Mad

Actors: Essie Davis, Nathan Page, Hugo Johnstone-Burt, Ashleigh Cummings
Plot: Inspired by a Kerry Greenwood short story and set at a university college. When the fresh corpse of Professor Katz turns up in place of a cadaver in Dr Mac's anatomy lecture she demands ...
